title: How much data would YouTube consume for an 8k 1-hour video? - Quora

response.answer_text: Short Answer: 6500mb per hourHow I found this out: If you look at this graph you will notice somthing  It kinda doubles from 240 to 480 from 100mb to 240mb but there is a little bit added to it and that number would get a lot bigger. So 1080 x 8 would = roughly 8k and 750mb x 8 = 6000mb but add a bit to the end as it isn’t a perfect double.
If the video Is in 60 fps,It would take roughly 3–4 GB If it is in 120 fps(standard for most 8K videos ) it will be around 13–15 GB.
